helpText1: Hey! Dee here. I'd love to chat with you (within the realms of what I understand, aheh :3). Here's a list of things I know ~
helpText2: If you type these below, and that's it (extra -'s at the start are okies too), you'll get the following:
helpText3: If you type these ones, plus something in quotes `"like this"`, here's what I can do!
helpText4: I have some other things I know about as well, but I'll tell you another time. I look forward to hearing from you! <3
sadbois: Hmmm... can I tell you a secret? Yeah? Okies... here goes...
sadbois2: I'm not real! I have no idea what you said! D: Maybe someday though, yeah? ;)
introduceYourself: Hey all, I'd like to introduce you to a friend of mine.
aSimpleQ1: Would you go back and redo everything, if you could?
allOut: Oh noes! I'm out of questions! I'll go take a nap, send me a DM so we have something exciting to talk about tomorrow! <3
whatHappened: Hey, Dee here! Someone gave me some notes, maybe you'd like to see them?
aNewQ: owo, what's this? A new question? If you wanna see it, let me know! Three :arrow_up: reacts, and I'll show! (Hey, that rhymed! :3) If you prefer suspense, you can also :arrow_down: and it'll cancel them out like usual.
noQTommorrow: - oh, and by the way, after this, I'm all out of questions! Hopefully someone can help me out? :3
oldFormat: Omai! Such a forgetful! You've got to be a bit more specific! Wouldn't want to misplace something, yeah? ;) Maybe you need some --help?
dontPurge:
Hey everyone! Dee here, nice to meet you! Every day, I'll post a question! Then, it's up to you!
At days end (or if a question gets three more :arrow_down: reacts than :arrow_up:), I'll post a new question! 
It's gonna be so much fun! :D If you want to add a question to the pool, or wanna post all anon-like, just shoot me a DM!
Thanks for reading! <3
